page.title: 04LOLWORTH
page.content: We travelled to the other two villages in our area. Lolworth is a tiny "cul-de-sac" village and we had a small part of it in our block,just a few houses and a farm.The farm is also a riding school. Lolworth is a very old village but there has been a few new houses built there in recent years.The village has been developed ribbonly along two or three roads. Both Lolworth and Dry Drayton were originally developed as agricultural villages.Today,although some of the residents do work on local farms,they are mainly dormitory villages for Cambridge.
